selections.name: Bustling City (AUS)
selections.reason: Debutant with Zac Purton aboard. Trial winner at Conghua and profiles as a sharp early type ready to fire first up.

selections.name: Lahore (AUS)
selections.reason: Showed significant improvement to finish 2nd last start. Draws the rail (1) which is a massive advantage over the 5f sprint.

selections.name: Alsonso (AUS)
selections.reason: Drops into a winnable grade. Hugh Bowman takes the ride and draws well in barrier 4. Capable of bouncing back.

selections.name: Leading Dragon (AUS)
selections.reason: Ran a respectable 5th on debut at huge odds. Karis Teetan sticks, natural improver.

danger_horse.name: Lahore (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: The rail draw in a 5f sprint is a major advantage; if he jumps well, he could be hard to catch.

selections.name: Only U (NZ)
selections.reason: Recent 2nd place finish shows he is knocking on the door. Draws perfectly in barrier 2 for Karis Teetan.

selections.name: Majestic Delight (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent form (3rd and 2nd recently). The wide barrier (14) is the only negative, but has the speed to overcome it.

selections.name: Rewarding Twinkle (AUS)
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start, not beaten far. Draws well (3) and maps to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Always Fluke (AUS)
selections.reason: Drops in class and gets the inside gate. Guyon aboard suggests intent.

danger_horse.name: Majestic Delight (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Form is good enough to win, but the parking lot draw makes him a risk/reward play.

selections.name: Patch Of Theta (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent performer at Group level. 3rd in G3 last start. Draws perfectly (2) and Bowman rides. The one to beat.

selections.name: Light Years Charm (AUS)
selections.reason: James McDonald aboard. 8th in G3 last time but better than that. Short odds suggest stable confidence.

selections.name: Tomodachi Kokoroe (AUS)
selections.reason: 5th in G1 Centenary Sprint Cup. Drops back to G3 company here. Class factor.

selections.name: Beauty Eternal (AUS)
selections.reason: Veteran with class. 5th last start. Can hit the board if the pace is hot.

selections.name: Crossborderdude (NZ)
selections.reason: Zac Purton takes the ride. 3rd last start and looks ready to peak. Barrier 10 is tricky but Purton navigates well.

selections.name: Warriors Dream (IRE)
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Karis Teetan aboard. Maps well from the middle gate.

selections.name: Run Run Smart (IRE)
selections.reason: Value runner. Has ability but draws wide. If he gets cover, he can close late.

selections.name: Autumn Vibes (AUS)
selections.reason: Lyle Hewitson rides. Has been running fairly. Needs luck from the car park draw (13).

danger_horse.name: Warriors Dream (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who will capitalize if the top pick gets trapped wide.

selections.name: Smart Golf (AUS)
selections.reason: Coming off a win. Despite the wide draw (12), he has the speed to cross or sit wide with cover. Top rater.

selections.name: Prestige Hall (NZ)
selections.reason: Hugh Bowman aboard. 6th last start but wasn't beaten far. Will be running on strongly.

selections.name: Joy Capital (NZ)
selections.reason: Last start winner. Horrific draw (14) makes it tough, but form is undeniable.

selections.name: Cloud Nine (BRZ)
selections.reason: Consistent type. Ferraris rides. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Prestige Hall (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: Bowman factor plus a likely fast pace set by the wide-drawn leaders suits his closing style.

selections.name: Together We Value (AUS)
selections.reason: Zac Purton rides. 2nd last start. Draws perfectly in barrier 3 to stalk the speed and pounce.

selections.name: Sight Hermoso (AUS)
selections.reason: Last start winner at the track/distance. Brenton Avdulla retains the ride. Ideally drawn (4).

selections.name: Wonderstar (AUS)
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner. Chadwick rides. Should be competitive in this grade.

selections.name: Alpha Strike (AUS)
selections.reason: Vincent Ho aboard. Has ability but needs to overcome the draw.

danger_horse.name: Sight Hermoso (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is the best form. He has confidence and a good gate.

selections.name: Robot Star (AUS)
selections.reason: Last start winner. Zac Purton sticks. In peak form and looks the one to beat again.

selections.name: The Golden Knight (AUS)
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Hugh Bowman takes the reins. The main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Blazing Wukong (AUS)
selections.reason: Consistent. McMonagle rides. Wide draw is a concern but has class.

selections.name: Amazing Award (AUS)
selections.reason: Jerry Chau rides. Good draw (5). Can sneak into the placings at odds.

danger_horse.name: The Golden Knight (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Bowman/Lui combination is lethal. He will be right there at the finish.

selections.name: Invincible Ibis (AUS)
selections.reason: On a 4-race winning streak. Hugh Bowman rides. The horse to beat in the Classic Mile despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Sagacious Life (BRZ)
selections.reason: Won last start. Zac Purton aboard. Class runner but barrier 13 is a major hurdle.

selections.name: Little Paradise (AUS)
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Vincent Ho rides. Draws much better (6) than the top two.

selections.name: Public Attention (NZ)
selections.reason: Brenton Avdulla. 4th last start. Draws the rail (1) and could save all the ground while others work wide.

danger_horse.name: Sagacious Life (BRZ)
danger_horse.reason: Purton will need to produce a gem from gate 13, but the horse has the engine to win.

selections.name: Six Pack (AUS)
selections.reason: Last start winner. Draws the rail (1). Should get the run of the race.

selections.name: Thousand Spirit (AUS)
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Lyle Hewitson rides. Draws well (3) to be competitive.

selections.name: Mid Winter Wind (SAF)
selections.reason: Hugh Bowman. 3rd last start. Class horse but the barrier (13) is terrible.

selections.name: Happy Boss (AUS)
selections.reason: Last start winner. Consistent type. Can figure again.

danger_horse.name: Thousand Spirit (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Maps perfectly from gate 3. If the favorite gets traffic on the rail, he is the beneficiary.

selections.name: Beauty Bolt (IRE)
selections.reason: James McDonald takes the ride. 2nd last start. Elite jockey booking signals intent.

selections.name: Chiu Chow Spirit (AUS)
selections.reason: Hugh Bowman. 3rd last start. Consistent performer in this grade.

selections.name: Lucky Sam Gor (NZ)
selections.reason: Last start winner. Jerry Chau rides. Confidence is high.

selections.name: Crimson Flash (AUS)
selections.reason: Andrea Atzeni. 5th last start. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Chiu Chow Spirit (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Bowman on a consistent horse is always a threat.

selections.name: Super Express (NZ)
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Maxime Guyon rides. Looks ready to win.

selections.name: Star Satyr (AUS)
selections.reason: Zac Purton aboard. 4th last start. The Purton factor is huge in the last race.

selections.name: Riding Together (IRE)
selections.reason: Lyle Hewitson. 6th last start. Capable of hitting the frame.

selections.name: Daryl Flash (AUS)
selections.reason: Matthew Poon. 7th last start. Wide draw makes it tough but has ability.

danger_horse.name: Star Satyr (AUS)
danger_horse.reason: Purton in the 'Get Out Stakes' is a dangerous proposition for bookmakers.
